ObjectClass.Name: Octopod (Progen)
ObjectClass.Description:
Must be near a Sepipod or Pharopod that is also in Progeneration mode Must be near a Spyre or research Loligo Tech to progenerate air units.
Auto-attacks vs ground and air [damage: 6.0/s, R: 20]

Objective.Name: Recycle All
Objective.Details: Re-absorb all progenitors\Recover QP and Power

Objective.Name: Recycle
Objective.Details: Re-absorb Octopod\Recover QP and Power

Objective.Name: Repeat Last Order
Objective.Details: \Repeats the last production order

Objective.Name: Set to Idle
Objective.Details: \Clear smart-production memory

Objective.Name: Set Congregation Pointers
Objective.Details: \Set congregation point and/or\hierarchy leader for pregenerated units

Objective.Name: Clear Congregation Pointers
Objective.Details: \Clear congregation point and\hierarchy leader

Objective.Name: Produce Octopod
Objective.Details: Biological main ground-assault armor\Mobile anti-ground heavy sniper\Progenerates advanced units\Morphs into Ghost

Objective.Name: Produce Humbolt/Sepipod
Objective.Details: Tactical air superiority fighter-bomber\Good scout and raider; Biological\Progenerates adv. octo and pharo units\Detects cloaked units\Can Chronobomb (Specials research)

Objective.Name: Produce Vampire/Pharopod
Objective.Details: Biological steatlh strike-bomber\Very high damage against ground targets\Progenerates adv. octo and sepi units\Cloaks

Objective.Name: Produce Cthulhu/Octoligo
Objective.Details: Biological heavy-support armor\Provides high-impact swarm supression\Devastating vs infantry and grouped aircraft\Can progenerate base Sepi and Pharo pair\Can Nanite Infect (req. Specials tech)

Objective.Name: Produce Hydra/Sepiligo
Objective.Details: Very fast biological air supremacy platform\Variable rate of fire\Devastating vs other aircraft\Effective in groups vs ground\Can progenerate base Octo and Pharo pair

Objective.Name: Produce Medusa/Pharoligo
Objective.Details: Slow biological siege aircraft\Fires slow moving expolsive energy blasts\Strong vs long range stationary targets\Can progenerate base Octo and Sepi pair\Disruption beam (Specials research)

Objective.Name: Octopod
Objective.Details: \Must have a progenerating\Sepipod and Pharopod pair

Objective.Name: Humbolt/Sepipod
Objective.Details: \Must have a progenerating\Pharopod and Octopod pair\Must be near a Spyre or research\ Loligo Tech

Objective.Name: Vampire/Pharopod
Objective.Details: \Must have a progenerating\Octopod and Sepipod pair\Must be near a Spyre or research\ Loligo Tech

Objective.Name: Cthulhu/Octoligo
Objective.Details: \Must have a progenerating\Sepipod and Pharopod pair\Must be near a Spyre or research\ Loligo Tech

Objective.Details: \Must have a progenerating\Pharopod and Octopod pair\Must be near a Spyre or research\ Loligo Tech

Objective.Details: \Must have a progenerating\Octopod and Sepipod pair\Must be near a Spyre or research\ Loligo Tech
